my husband died a few years ago , so i am raising them alone.

content.text: Hello! Doing well, just enjoying a quiet day. Yourself?
Good to hear! I'm doing well too, just getting some gardening done.
Gardening? That sounds lovely. I wish I had a green thumb.
It's not too hard to get started. I grow sunflowers, they're pretty easy to take care of.
Sunflowers! I love sunflowers. They're so cheerful.
They're my favorite flower. I love to show them off to my friends.
I'm sure they love them too. What else do you like to do?
I like to spend time with my family and friends. They're my favorite people.
Me too. My family is my whole world. I'm also raising my kids alone since my husband died a few years ago.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I'm sure you're doing a great job.
Thanks. I'm trying. I love my kids more than anything in the world.
I can tell. You sound like a great mom.
Thanks. You seem like a great person too. I'm glad we met.
Me too! It's been nice chatting with you.
You too! Have a great day!
